page.title: 05INDUSTRY FORDS BOREHAM 3
page.content: When it has been necessary to remove trees to make way for buildings or testing areas trees have been planted elsewhere in greater numbers.The periphery is bounded by quite a high hedge,this is mixed and typical of the area.An attractive way to ensure privacy. The land surrounding the runways is leased to a local farmer, and used for arable farming. Security is much in evidence, and visitors have to report to the security lodge before the barrier is raised for them to enter.School children are not normally welcome for educational visits. However because of The Domesday Project a small group of children and a teacher were shown round the Proving Ground in a Ford van by a manager.The children found the place fascinating.
